items.content_html: temu-v0 is a lightweight framework designed for rapid application development. It simplifies the process of building scalable web applications with a focus on user-friendly interfaces and efficient performance.

items.content_html: A lightweight custom WordPress plugin that adds a fixed "Add to Cart" and optional "Buy Now" bar to the bottom of single WooCommerce product pages.
items.title: alamin-karno/woocommerce-sticky-bottom-cart-bar: A lightweight custom WordPress plugin that adds a fixed "Add to Cart" and optional "Buy Now" bar to the bottom of single WooCommerce product pages.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.title: Mishammmm/paxsenix-ai.js: A lightweight and intuitive Node.js client for the Paxsenix AI API.

items.content_html: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.
items.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

items.content_html: PiSync is a lightweight service that helps PiBook and PiBox devices sync offline learning data (like videos watched, notes taken, assignments completed) to the cloud when internet connectivity is available.
items.title: gupta03akshita/PiSync: PiSync is a lightweight service that helps PiBook and PiBox devices sync offline learning data (like videos watched, notes taken, assignments completed) to the cloud when internet connectivity is available.

items.content_html: A lightweight tool to measure the response time of websites.
items.title: shivarm/web-check: A lightweight tool to measure the response time of websites.

items.content_html: A lightweight Chrome extension that calculates and displays your current and projected grades on Coursera, based on weighted assignment scores. Instantly see your performance across graded and ungraded tasks directly within the Assignments page.
items.title: JosephTJennings/coursera-gradecalc-extension:  A lightweight Chrome extension that calculates and displays your current and projected grades on Coursera, based on weighted assignment scores. Instantly see your performance across graded and ungraded tasks directly within the Assignments page.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

items.content_html: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.
items.title: Santhosh785/MilkMate: MilkMate is a lightweight web application built for local milk vendors to simplify daily milk delivery tracking and customer payment management. Designed with React for the frontend and PHP + MySQL for the backend, MilkMate replaces paper records with a clean, digital interface.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.
items.title: simstudioai/sim: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
